name: football-events
description: - **[React](https://reactjs.org/) - For the frontend** - **[TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) - As a programming language** - **[React Router DOM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-router-dom) - To create single page app** - **[Redux](https://redux.js.org/) - for state management** - **[Docker](https://www.docker.com/) - For global use** - **[Socket.io](https://socket.io/) - For live connection**
